# default charsets should be ASCII
moac-pwgen
! stderr '.'
stdin stdout
exec tr -dc '\40-\176'
stdin stdout
exec wc -m
! stderr '.'
stdout 40

moac-pwgen
stdin stdout
exec wc -m
! stderr '.'
stdout 40

moac-pwgen latin
! stderr '.'
stdin stdout
exec tr -dc '\40-\176'
stdin stdout
exec wc -m
! stderr '.'
stdout 0

moac-pwgen latin1
! stderr '.'
stdin stdout
exec tr -dc '\240-\377'
stdin stdout
exec wc -m
! stderr '.'
stdout [1-9][0-9]

# for some reason, "wc -m" behaves like "wc -c" in testscript
# so we gotta match the password against 45 dots.
moac-pwgen -qm 5.97e24 -t 1.45e17 -T 1900 ascii latin
! stderr '.'
stdout '^.............................................$'

moac-pwgen -qm 5.97e24 -t 1.45e17 -g 1.818e-20 ascii latin
! stderr '.'
stdout '^.............................................$'
